DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to test the effect of an implanted device that stimulates the stomach on weight loss in patients suffering from obesity and type 2 diabetes.
DOC.brief_title: Study of Weight Loss Using Gastric Stimulation in Obese Patients With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetes with HbA1c of 7.5 11% Willing to make behavior and lifestyle modifications No previous bariatric surgery (gastric bypass, gastric banding) Meet additional study criteria History of substance abuse or chemical dependency with in the last 3 years Prior GI surgery for morbid obesity or any gastric surgery for conditions other than obesity or diabetes Severe congestive heart failure Any underlying illness other than diabetes or obesity that affects gastrointestinal motility Currently taking medications for weight loss
